title: Replace eBay text banner with image banner and display all three sponsor banners side-by-side

requirements.summary: Save the uploaded car photo as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg for use as the eBay affiliate banner base
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded car photo is saved as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg
The file is accessible from the frontend at that path

file_operations.description: Save the edited image (slammed orange Honda Civic rear photo with RevGrid logo overlay and dark amber gradient) as a static banner asset. This file will be referenced in the Layout component as the eBay affiliate banner image. The image editing (logo composite, gradient overlay) is handled by the image generation system based on imageRequirements.edits in the BuildRequest.

requirements.summary: Replace the eBay text banner with an image banner and display all three sponsor banners (eBay, BullBoost, Enjuku Racing) side-by-side in a single horizontal row
acceptanceCriteria: The eBay banner is displayed as an image (not text) in the Layout component
The eBay image banner links to https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1 opening in a new tab
The BullBoost banner image (bullboost-logo.dim_760x200.png) is displayed alongside the eBay banner
The Enjuku Racing banner image (enjuku-racing-banner.dim_940x627.jpg) is displayed alongside the eBay and BullBoost banners
All three banners are displayed side-by-side in the same horizontal row
The row is styled with the app's dark asphalt/amber automotive theme
All three banners are individually clickable and open their respective links in a new tab
The banner row appears on every authenticated page inside the Layout component

file_operations.description: Replace the existing text-based eBay affiliate banner with an image-based banner strip containing all three sponsor banners displayed side-by-side. Create a horizontal row with three clickable image banners: (1) eBay banner using frontend/public/assets/generated/ebay-banner.dim_940x313.jpg linking to https://ebay.com/inf/revreel?mkcid=1&mkrid=711-53200-19255-0&siteid=0&campid=5339143418&toolid=80008&mkevt=1, (2) BullBoost banner using the existing bullboost-logo asset linking to https://bullboostperformance.com/?ref=xprbexxu, and (3) Enjuku Racing banner using frontend/public/assets/generated/enjuku-racing-banner.dim_940x627.jpg linking to https://enjukuracing.com. Each banner must be wrapped in an anchor tag with target='_blank' and rel='noopener noreferrer'. Style the row with the app's dark asphalt background (bg-asphalt-800 or similar), ensure the images are contained with object-fit, and maintain equal width or proportional columns for visual balance. Position the banner row between the TopBar and the main Outlet content area. Use Tailwind utility classes consistent with the existing dark automotive theme.
